newsitem.title: INDIA: Delhi bourse extends trading session by 45 mins.
newsitem.headline: Delhi bourse extends trading session by 45 mins.

text.p: Trading on the Delhi Stock Exchange has been extended by 45 minutes on Tuesday and will close at 4.30 p.m. (1100 GMT) instead of the regular closing time of 3.45 p.m. (1015 GMT), exchange officials said.
The bourse's benchmark index was 10.95 points higher at 724.16 at 4.10 p.m. (1040 GMT).
They did not explain why the trading session had been extended.
